website_summaries.verdict: Classy-looking pad from a top rated name in saddle pads.
pros: This high-quality pad comes in a variety of colors with contrasting stitching around the edge
Wicks away sweat for four season use
cons: Some found the colors shown online did not run true to the product

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and great size !! Hopefully it's easy to clean. The colors are fabulous ! This is on a 17.1 hand thoroughbred .
customer_reviews.author: Laurel siemasko

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost pad.  The purple color is not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark green with gold trim and although it pilled some during washing, it's held up well. I recently bought the purple with orange trim and it is NOT as pictured. Rather than a deep purple, it's a my-little-pony purple. It would probably look nice on a grey, but will look a little odd on bay. Since I got a good deal and I only need it for schooling, I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these saddle pads
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these saddle pads. I only buy Roma now. The Full size works well on bigger TBs and WBs and covers everything it should. I also like the contouring; it fits the horses' backs and withers beautifully and stands up to lots of washing (just don't put it in the dryer!).
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Posting for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter gave this 5 stars because: It has very nice padding. The color is beautiful. The pattern is unique and attractive. Temperatures here hovering around 0, give or take so she is anxious to try it with her new saddle but will wait for a little warmer day.
customer_reviews.author: katisaw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and nice
customer_reviews.text: In love with this pad!! It’s thicker and nicer than I expected and is the exact color I’ve been looking for. Does not move around when I rode in it. Looks so good on my horse!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Ok pad, but not the best long-wearing fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nice thickness but pilled badly after the first wash. Would not buy this particular pad again, but still using it after 2 years as it is still functional.
customer_reviews.author: katmoonblue

customer_reviews.title: Cute pad, fits well, and good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute! Fits our 13 hh pony well. Color well represented on web page, and I like that it’s not your typical flimsy cotton pad that bunches up easily while under saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Farms

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Absolutely beautiful. Also easy to care for and comes out of the wash looking new!
customer_reviews.author: LPJ215MD

customer_reviews.title: Bright and merry!
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this saddle pad. Great quality and the thickness is just right. Fits perfect on a big, muscular horse.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color great quality

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful saddle pad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green and gold saddle pad and wow!!! It is stunning, the colors are so vibrant and beautiful and as if Roma pads weren't amazing enough the green and gold pad has the special wicking material. The saddle pad shipped and arrived within 3 days! I am a happy satisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value

customer_reviews.author: Samantha VanFleet

customer_reviews.title: Love this pad, may buy another! 💙
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the aqua color is really a gorgeous deep teal (just what I wanted)!!! The size is perfect for my growing 2 yr old and my hunter saddle fits perfect on it. The cushioning is fantastic. The only thing I don't like is the girth billet straps. Instead of being cloth like my other hunt pads, this one is velcro so the rough velcro rubs on my billet. It's not super rough, so I don't feel it'll rough up my saddle (I just prefer the soft cloth straps).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pink color
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Soft yet durable cotton. Beautiful pink color. 8 year old daughter is super excited!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this pad!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality! Plenty of thickness for a comfortable ride but not too thick. Summer or winter :)

customer_reviews.title: Great size, color
customer_reviews.text: Great size, color, and nice thickness. I have 2 of these saddle pads and will probably be purchasing more. The trim on them is cute and I bought polo wraps to match the yellow trim. Looks really nice on my horse!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: I love this saddle pad

customer_reviews.title: Mint is gorgeous  on my dark bay!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pad! Arrived in perfect condition. It's exactly the shade shown, a soft muted mint and it's so pretty! I had bought a couple of inexpensive schooling pads off of a major equine supply site and they don't come anywhere close to how classy these look and they're just a few dollars more. I'll be ordering more for myself and a few for barn holiday gifts. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: In general the Roma saddle pads are great, but I returned this one simply because I was disappointed by the colors. Online the combination of the teal and mustard looked sharp however in reality, the mustard is more of a dark yellow/orange and the teal is more blue and flat.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, bright colors.
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for the price. Padding is a tad thinner than I thought it would be(about 1" thick), but still nice. Colors are bright and not dull at all. The pad I bought was sky blue, and the picture looks a tad darker than what it was. Good thing in my case, as I switched shades as it was being shipped. Overall, great pad for the price.
